User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64; rv:7.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/7.0
Build ID: 20110816154714

Steps to reproduce:

I hit the 'trash' button, which is right next to the archive button.


Actual results:

My mail went into the 'trash' and my trash is large, so finding the email was cumberdome


Expected results:

If the archive button was on the left, it would mean there would be no possibilty of hitting trash accidently
